name: Quick and Tasty Banana Pudding

ingredients.name: cool whip frozen whipped topping
ingredients.original_string: 3  tablespoons Cool Whip frozen whipped topping, thawed

ingredients.name: crushed vanilla wafer cookies, if desired
ingredients.original_string: Crushed vanilla wafer cookies, if desired

instructions: In 5-oz glass, place 1 vanilla wafer cookie. Top with 1/3 of the banana slices, 1 tablespoon of the whipped topping, another vanilla wafer cookie and 1 tablespoon of vanilla pudding. Repeat layers, beginning with banana slices.
Top with remaining banana slices and 1 tablespoon whipped topping. Garnish with crushed cookies.
